column1: '''Warden of the Keys''' was a high office of [[Minas Tirith]] in [[Gondor]].
At the time of the [[War of the Ring]]
column2: the position was filled by [[Húrin (Warden of the Keys)|Húrin the Tall]]
column3: who gained the epithet "of the Keys". At the coronation of [[Aragorn]]
column4: he opened a barricade (laid in place of the destroyed gate) at the [[Great Gate of Minas Tirith|gatehouse of of Minas Tirith]] for the new king. Other than that
column5: what other tasks and responsibilities belonged to this office remains unknown.<ref>{{RK|VI5}}</ref>
